description: Detects the export of a crital Registry key to a file.
false_positives: Dumping hives for legitimate purpouse i.e. backup or forensic investigation
name: Exports Critical Registry Keys To a File
query: (process.executable:*\\regedit.exe AND process.command_line:(*\ \/E\ * OR *\ \-E\ *) AND process.command_line:(*hklm* OR *hkey_local_machine*) AND process.command_line:(*\\system OR *\\sam OR *\\security))
author: Oddvar Moe
Sander Wiebing
oscd.community
